name: .SONG File Extension
summary: Learn about .SONG files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A SONG file is a song created by AudioSauna, a free online music production studio. It contains an audio project which includes bass, electro, and organ sounds along with synthesizer settings. SONG files can be exported as .WAV files.

content: AudioSauna can be opened in a web browser meaning you do not have to download the software to use it. The interface consists of a virtual analog synthesizer that can be used to create songs and loops by adding sounds from presets and altering the settings. You can modify the volume, frequency, and speed, apply distortion effects, and more.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
